description:

#IGN #Gaming #gamescom2025
title: Everything Announced at gamescom Opening Night Live 2025

author: IGN
description:
Do you want to play a game? New Squid Game creator made games are coming to Fortnite tomorrow, and Front Man arrives on August 26.

#ign #gamescom2025
title: Fortnite x Squid Game - Creator Made Games Trailer | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Legendary game designer Yuu Suzuki and Inin Games have announced an upgraded version of Shenmue 3, coming to all current-gen consoles and PC. This new version will feature 4K textures, faster loading times, and upgrades to the gameplay, among other improvements. Speaking of announcements, the next entry in the lauded WW1 FPS series, Gallipoli, has been revealed. This new game will take place in the Middle Eastern campaign, during the Battle of Gallipoli. And we have a preview of the new Isle of Berk expansion at Universal Epic Universe, and it's brand-new ride—Hiccup's Wing Gliders.
Presented by Universal Orlando Resort and its new theme park, Universal Epic Universe.

#IGN #Gaming #gamescom2025
title: Shenmue 3 Gets an Enhanced Edition Coming to Switch, PS5, Xbox, PC - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description:
Process entry files and documents as you try to defend democracy in post-war Germany. Prosecute Nazis and bring them to justice in The Darkest Files, available now on Steam and coming to Nintendo Switch.

#ign #gamescom2025
title: The Darkest Files - Gamescom Trailer | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Here's your look at the Star Trek: Infection VR release window trailer for this upcoming narrative survival game set in the Star Trek universe. Step into the unsettling world in this Star Trek: Infection VR trailer and get a peek at what you can expect ahead of the game's launch on Meta Quest and Steam VR in 2025.

#gamescom2025
title: Star Trek: Infection VR - Official Release Date Trailer | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Get a look at resource gathering, crafting, exploration, combat, and the enemies you'll face in this new Everwind trailer for the upcoming RPG and first-person sandbox survival game. Embark on the adventure with your friends - Build a base on a flying island-ship, gather resources, craft, loot, and fight while you rise above the clouds to uncover the mysteries of this world. 
Everwind will be available on PC.

#gamescom2025
title: Everwind - Official Gameplay Trailer | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Step once more into the nightmarish world and comic-book visuals of I Hate This Place in the latest trailer for the upcoming craft-based, isometric survival horror game with twisted monsters and warped reality. Scavenge and build to survive terrifying days and nights while using stealth and noise to fight enemies that stalk by sound. All styled with bold comic art and an '80s horror vibe. 
I Hate This Place will be available on PC (Steam, Epic Games Store, and GOG), Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 5 (PS5), and Xbox Series X/S on November 7, 2025.

#gamescom2025
title: I Hate This Place - Official Release Date Trailer | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Vampire: The Masquerade -- Bloodlines 2 gets a new trailer and a release date announcement, as revealed during Opening Night Live (ONL) at gamescom 2025. Check out the latest brutal Vampire: The Masquerade -- Bloodlines 2 for this upcoming RPG to see bloody gameplay and more from this sequel. Vampire: The Masquerade -- Bloodlines 2 will be available on PC (via Epic Games Store, GOG, and Steam), Xbox Series X/S, and PlayStation 5 (PS5) on October 21, 2025.

#IGN #Gaming #gamescom2025
title: Vampire: The Masquerade -- Bloodlines 2 - Official Release Date Trailer | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Get a new look at Silent Hill f, an upcoming third-person psychological horror survival game developed by NeeBards Entertainment. Players will explore the hometown of Hinako after fog surrounds and fills the city from every corner. Dispatch unworldly monsters, solve off-putting puzzles, and uncover the beauty behind the madness. Silent Hill f is launching on September 25 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam, Windows, and Epic Games Store).

#IGN #Gaming #gamescom2025
title: Silent Hill f - Gamescom Gameplay Trailer | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Get a fresh look at Honor of Kings: World in this new trailer for the upcoming open-world co-op fantasy-action-RPG, as unveiled during Opening Night Live (ONL) at gamescom 2025. The latest Honor of Kings: World trailer showcases combat against large foes and more of its gorgeous world.

#ign #gamescom2025
title: Honor of Kings: World - Official Trailer | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Cronos: The New Dawn gets a new trailer during Opening Night Live at gamescom 2025. Check out the latest Cronos: The New Dawn trailer for the upcoming third-person survival horror game from developer Bloober Team. The new Cronos: The New Dawn cinematic trailer showcases a cat, the broken world you'll explore, and the terrifying, mutilated creatures, known as Orphans, you'll fight against. Cronos: The New Dawn will be available on PC, PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X/S, and Nintendo Switch 2 on September 5, 2025.

#IGN #gamescom2025
title: Cronos: The New Dawn - Official 'A New Breed Of Horror' Trailer | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Build your own future as a blacksmith in the Legacy of the Forge DLC, coming to Kingdom Come: Deliverance II on September 9. Included in the Expansion Pass, Kingdom Come: Deliverance II is available now on PS5, Xbox Series X/S, PC, and GeForce Now.

#IGN #gamescom2025
title: Kingdom Come: Deliverance II - Legacy of the Forge - Release Date Trailer | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Welcome to a whole new alternate-history World of Tanks experience from the minds at Wargaming. Fight in 10 vs 10 battles using high-tech, customizable tanks, unique combat abilities, and more. World of Tanks: HEAT is coming to Steam, Steam Deck, PS5, and Xbox Series X/S, and you can wishlist it now.

#IGN #gamescom2025
title: World of Tanks: HEAT - Reveal Trailer | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Meet Mojo, Omega Red, Lady Deathstrike, Mephisto, and Ultimo in this latest Marvel Deadpool VR trailer for the upcoming action shooter VR game. The new Marvel Deadpool VR story trailer showcases gameplay and unveils a release date. Marvel Deadpool VR will be available on Meta Quest 3 and Meta Quest 3S on November 18, 2025.

 After being pulled through a portal to Mojoworld, Deadpool sees a chance to get rich—like really rich. He signs a sketchy contract without reading any of the fine print and then it’s off to visit a bunch of locations from across the Marvel Universe, battling against iconic (and not-so-iconic) villains. Featuring Neil Patrick Harris as Deadpool, experience parkour and combat with over-the-top moments like only the merc with the mouth can pull off. 

#ign #gamescom2025
title: Marvel Deadpool VR - Official Story Trailer | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Check out a brand-new look at Resident Evil Requiem, an upcoming third and first person survival horror shooter developed by Capcom. Players will embody FBI analyst Grace Ashcroft as a case takes her back to the outbreak in Raccoon City with deep ties to her mother all wrapped up in a sinister plot. Resident Evil Requiem is launching on February 26, 2026 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#ign #gamescom2025
title: Resident Evil Requiem - Gamescom Gameplay Trailer | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Reveal Trailer for Black Myth: Zhong Kui, an action souls-like RPG developed by Game Science. Players will continue the story of the Destined One in a Chinese mythology-inspired environment to overcome challenges, dispatch enemies along the way, and bring the truth to light. Experience new mystical happenings in the world of Black Myth: Zhong Kui, coming soon.

#IGN #gamescom2025
title: Black Myth: Zhong Kui - Official Reveal Trailer | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Don’t miss a new look at Ghost of Yotei, an upcoming third-person action-adventure game developed by Sucker Punch Productions. Players will embark on a story of revenge as Atsu in this action-packed sequel to the hit Ghost of Tsushima. Explore all that Ezo has to offer on the ultimate hunt for the Yotei Six, who are responsible for a family tragedy in Atsu’s life. Make use of an array of new weapons and equipment to take on bounties, gaze upon scenic landscapes, and track down those responsible for Atsu’s dark past. Ghost of Yotei is launching on October 2 for PlayStation 5 (PS5) alongside the critically acclaimed Ghost of Yotei Legends, a co-op mission adventure mode coming in 2026.

#IGN #gamescom2025
title: Ghost of Yotei - Song of Vengeance Trailer | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Story Teaser Trailer for Project Spectrum, a first-person horror shooter developed by Team Jade. Players will explore a dark forest with monstrous anomalies with supernatural abilities, seeking violence by any means necessary. Make use of powerful weapons to dispatch enemies and become the hunter or hunted in Project Spectrum, coming soon.

#ign #gamescom2025
title: Project Spectrum - Story Teaser Trailer | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Gameplay Trailer for John Carpenter's Toxic Commando, an upcoming 80's first-person co-op shooter developed by Saber Interactive. Players will take on massive enemy hordes and daunting bosses in a near future where an experimental attempt to harness the power of the Earth’s core ends in a terrifying disaster. Make use of a suite of weapons alongside classes tailored to a variety of playstyles to get the jump on enemies with grenades, special abilities, and more. John Carpenter's Toxic Commando is launching in early 2026 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#IGN #Gaming #gamescom2025
title: John Carpenter's Toxic Commando - Official Gameplay Trailer | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
In the grim darkness of the far future, war has returned to the ravaged world of Kronus. As revealed during Opening Night Live (ONL) at gamescom 2025, here's your look at the Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War 4 announcement trailer for a new entry in the real-time strategy series. The trailer is narrated by Cyrus, Captain in the Blood Ravens 10th Company. The Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War 4 trailer also gives us a peek at battles and gameplay. Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War 4 will be available on PC in 2026.

Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War 4 will feature four main playable factions: Space Marines (Blood Ravens), Orks, Adeptus Mechanicus and the Necrons, and returning characters such as Jonah and Gorgutz.

Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War IV marks a triumphant return to the franchise's roots, with classic base-building, large armies, and deep strategic gameplay — all brought to life through modern innovations and a fresh narrative set on the iconic planet Kronus, approximately 200 years after t
title: Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War 4 - Official Announcement Trailer | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
I didn't really know what to expect from Vampire: The Masquerade -- Bloodlines 2 given the long, shadowed path it took to finally rest in my undead talons. But leading with a well-written and well-voiced mystery story that lets me explore my urban hunting ground with cool movement abilities has me intrigued to say the least. I don't love the combat so far, and the Masquerade system seems a bit too forgiving. But I'm thirsty to spend more time with it. Previewed by Leana Hafer

#IGN #Gaming
title: Vampire: The Masquerade – Bloodlines 2: First Impressions From a Series Veteran

author: IGN
description:
Don’t miss the Opening Cinematic for World of Warcraft: Midnight, the second expansion in the Worldsoul saga for the hit MMO RPG developed by Blizzard Entertainment. Players will deal with the trials and tribulations of the Void's invasion of Quel'Thalas and the Sunwell in the fight for unity across the elven tribes and the allies of the Light to take up arms in the name of peace. Take a look around the latest Opening Cinematic for World of Warcraft: Midnight, coming to PC in 2026.

#IGN #gamescom2025
title: World of Warcraft: Midnight - Official Opening Cinematic Trailer | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Embrace the fate of the Flameborn and try to rekindle a lost civilization in this 16-player co-op survival action RPG. Enshrouded is in early access now on Steam and GeForce Now.

#IGN #gamescom2025
title: Enshrouded - Official Wake of the Water Teaser Trailer | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Gameplay Trailer for Neverness to Evenness, a free-to-play urban open-world RPG developed by Hotta Studio. Assume the role of an Anomaly Hunter to combat enemies, explore the city, and investigate anomalies plaguing the city. Neverness to Evenness is coming soon to PlayStation 5 (PS5), iOS, Android, and PC.

#ign #gamescom2025
title: Neverness to Everness - Gameplay Trailer | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Battle waves of enemies and stay one step ahead of the Grim Reaper in Death By Scrolling, a new game vertical scrolling RPG from Ron Gilbert. Can you save the $10,000 you need to pay the ferryman? Wishlist now on Steam.

#ign #gamescom2025
title: Death by Scrolling - Gamescom Trailer | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description: Take a look at the Reveal Trailer for Zero Parades, a tactical CRPG developed by ZA/UM. Players will dive into the world of spy espionage where truth can be stranger than fiction. Get a glimpse at Zero Parades, coming soon.
title: Zero Parades - Reveal Trailer | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Europa Universalis V is coming, so prepare your grand strategy to rule the world across history. Create your own empire when it comes to PC. Wishlist and pre-purchase now.

#IGN #gamescom2025
title: Europa Universalis V - Reveal Trailer | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Don’t miss the 2.0 Update Trailer for World of Tanks, a tactical tank warfare game developed by Wargaming Group. Sink to the depths of tank warfare across a host of different environments from ice-filled tundras to dry deserts. World of Tanks Update 2.0 is launching on September 3 for PC.

#IGN #gamescom2025
title: World of Tanks - Update 2.0 Trailer | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Indiana Jones is coming back just as ancient Rome's greatest secret awakens. Indiana Jones and the Great Circle: The Order of Giants, coming to Xbox Series X/S, Xbox PC, Xbox Cloud, Steam, and PS5 on September 4th. Indiana Jones and the Great Circles also comes to Switch 2 in 2026.

#IGN #gamescom2025
title: Indiana Jones and the Great Circle: The Order of Giants - Announcement Trailer | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Demo Launch Trailer for Daemon X Machina: Titanic Scion, a sci-fi open-world mech shooter developed by Seed Games and Marvelous USA Inc. Players will customize an armored mech of their own design to take on enemies and bosses alike while exploring land and air. Daemon X Machina: Titanic Scion is launching on September 5 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC (Steam) with a demo available now.

#ign #gamescom2025
title: Daemon X Machina: Titanic Scion - Demo Launch Trailer | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Season 2 Teaser Trailer for Fallout, the live-action series based on the Bethesda-developed Fallout game series distributed by Amazon MGM Studios, and Kilter Films produced in association with Bethesda Game Studios and Bethesda Softworks.

Fallout is based on one of the most popular video game franchises of all time and is set 200 years after an apocalyptic event. The story follows the gentle denizens of luxury fallout shelters who are forced to return to the irradiated hellscape their ancestors left behind—and are shocked to discover an incredibly complex, gleefully weird, and highly violent universe waiting for them. The brief teaser trailer depicts Lucy MacLean and Cooper Howard venturing off across the wasteland with New Vegas in the distance, calling back to the famous game location in the franchise.

Fallout Season 2 stars Ella Purnell, Aaron Moten, Walton Goggins, Kyle MacLachlan, Moisés Arias, Frances Turner, and more. The Executive Producers for Fallout Season 2 are
title: Fallout Season 2 - Official Teaser Trailer | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description: Get ready to slash your way through monsters created by Malice and slay Genma with the Oni Gauntlet. Onimusha comes to PS5, Xbox Series X/S, and PC via Steam in 2026.
title: Onimusha: Way of the Sword - Gameplay Reveal Trailer | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Gameplay Trailer for Arknights: Endfield, a free-to-play action RPG developed by Hypergryph. Embark on a grand adventure to take on enemies in a strategic fashion in Arknights: Endfield, coming soon to PlayStation 5 (PS5), iOS, Android, and PC.

#ign #gamescom2025
title: Arknights: Endfield - Gameplay Trailer | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Monster Hunter Wilds Crossover Trailer for Final Fantasy 14, the hit online MMO RPG developed by Square Enix. Players can soon access new content from the hit monster-hunting game with Monster Hunter Wilds. The Monster Hunter Wilds collaboration is launching in early October for Final Fantasy 14 on PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, macOS, and PC.

#ign #gamescom2025
title: Final Fantasy 14 x Monster Hunter Wilds - Crossover Trailer | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Why so serious? Don the cape and cowl of Batman as he appears in the films, from Christian Bale to Robert Pattinson, in this upcoming LEGO Batman game, with third-person open world action. LEGO Batman: Legacy of the Dark Knight comes to PS5, Xbox Series X/S, Switch 2, and PC in 2026.

#IGN #gamescom2025
title: LEGO Batman: Legacy of the Dark Knight - Official Reveal Trailer (4K) | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Final Fantasy 14 Crossover Trailer for Monster Hunter Wilds, the latest installment to the hit monster-hunting franchise developed by Capcom. Players will be introduced to new content from Final Fantasy 14 in the world of Monster Hunter Wilds, including Chocobos and more. Access the Final Fantasy 14 Crossover in Monster Hunter Wilds in late September 2025 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#ign #gamescom2025
title: Monster Hunter Wilds x Final Fantasy 14 - Crossover Trailer | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description: Take a look at the Developer Overview Trailer for Call of Duty: Black Ops 7, the latest addition to the first-person shooter franchise. Hear from the developers about the journey players will take in the co-op campaign to explore the perception of reality as a whole and get a look at new gameplay mechanics. Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 is launching on November 14th for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and PC.
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 - Developer Overview Trailer | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Reveal Trailer for Road Kings, an upcoming next-generation truck driving simulation game developed by Saber Interactive. Players will begin from humble beginnings as a rookie truck driver to get behind the wheel of 40-ton semis, hauling cargo across the coastal plains of the American South. Manage multiple jobs, trailers, and routes, from busy Jacksonville to the shady streets of historic Savannah. Plan a route to satisfy all clients and take precautions against road hazards, weather, and more. Road Kings is launching in 2026 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#RoadKings #gamescom2025 #Gaming
title: Road Kings - Official Reveal Trailer | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Gameplay Reveal Trailer for Call of Duty: Black Ops 7, the next installment in the first-person shooter franchise developed by Treyarch. Players can get a brand-new look at the next title packed with new weapons, an organized crime syndicate called The Guild, and more as players follow the story of David Mason in 2035. Call of Duty Black Ops 7 is launching on November 14th for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and PC.

#IGN #gamescom2025
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 - Official Gameplay Reveal Trailer | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
PVKK is a planetary defense game where you have to fight off invasion from within your cannon-toting bunker. Wishlist now on Steam. Good luck!

#ign #gamescom2025
title: PVKK - Gamescom Trailer | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Long Gone, the new game from Hillfort games, is a narrative adventure where you'll need to rummage for supplies, fight off zombies, and more. Wishlist now on Steam.

#IGN #gamescom2025
title: Long Gone Gamescom Trailer | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
It's time for a Sonic and Pac-Man crossover! Sonic is coming to Pac-Man World 2 Re-Pac in the Sonic the Hedgehog DLC pack and Pac-Man comes to Sonic Racing CrossWorlds in the Pac-Man DLC in early 2026. Sonic Racing CrossWorlds launches Sept. 25, and Pac-Man World 2 Re-Pac comes out Sept. 26.

#IGN #gamescom2025
title: Sonic Racing CrossWorlds x PacMan World 2: Re-Pac Crossover Trailer | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Release Date Reveal Trailer for Absolum, an upcoming action beat ‘em up roguelite developed by Guard Crush, Supaamonks, and Dotemu. Players will fight as an outcast to retake the magic from Sun King Azra’s grasp. Absolum is launching on October 9 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #gamescom2025
title: Absolum - Release Date Trailer | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Check out the trailer for Routine, a first-person survival horror game developed by Lunar Software. Explore murky and dark environments with a suite of tactile technology to engage what lurks in the dark and make it out alive in the process. Routine is coming late 2025 for Xbox Series X|S, Xbox Game Pass, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #gamescom2025
title: Routine - Official Release Window Trailer | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Reveal Trailer for Swords of Legends, a new Chinese myth third-person action RPG adventure game developed by Aurogon Shanghai. Players will get to return to the Gujian series for the first time in 15 years as Si Pan, an Underworld Enforcer who's been reborn to take his onslaught to the mortal realm. Make use of a suite of mystical techniques, divine artifacts, and powerful weapons to wage war against any and all adversaries with the aid of captured souls who will fight on the journey. Swords of Legends is coming soon to PC and consoles.

#IGN #Gaming #gamescom2025
title: Swords of Legends - Official Reveal Trailer | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Here's your look at the Battlestar Galactica: Scattered Hopes announcement trailer for the upcoming turn-based roguelike game. The Battlestar Galactica: Scattered Hopes trailer dives into the story setting and gives a glimpse at gameplay. Battlestar Galactica: Scattered Hopes will be available on PC via Steam in early 2026.

#BattlestarGalacticaScatteredHopes #Gaming #IGN
title: Battlestar Galactica: Scattered Hopes - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Cinematic Reveal Trailer for Valor Mortis, a first-person action-adventure game developed by One More Level. Fight in a past era with a monstrous twist across a variety of battlefield. Make use of swords, bayonets, and powerful elemental abilities such as fire and more. Valor Mortis is coming soon to PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC.

#IGN #gamescom2025
title: Valor Mortis - Cinematic Reveal Trailer | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
He-Man is back in a beat-em-up by Limited Run! He-Man is coming soon to PS5, Steam, Xbox Series X/S, and Switch.

#IGN #gamescom2025
title: He-Man & The Masters Of The Universe: Dragon Pearl Of Destruction - Reveal Trailer | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Reveal Trailer for Outlaws Remaster, a remastered classic western adventure game developed by Nightdive Studios. Players will take on the tales of the Wild West with card games to master and gunfights to win, all remastered with HD features for modern hardware. Outlaws Remaster is coming soon for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam, Epic Games Store, GoG).

#ign #gamescom2025
title: Outlaws Remaster - Reveal Trailer | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Want to see trains kickflip? Check out the Denshattack! reveal trailer for this upcoming off-the-rails train platformer game to see the cool and vibrant world and trains doing insane tricks. Yes, trains. Denshattack! will be available on Xbox Series X/S, Xbox PC, Xbox Cloud, Steam, and PlayStation 5 (PS5) in Spring 2026.

Denshattack combines train track-hopping action platforming with Tony Hawk Pro Skater-style combo-based gameplay all wrapped up in a slick, rebellious Japanese-inspired art style.

#IGN #Gaming#gamescom2025
title: Denshattack! - Official Reveal Trailer | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description: Bubsy is back and now in more dimensions than ever? Maybe not... but get ready anyway because it's still called Bubsy 4D. Bubsy comes to Switch, Switch 2, Xbox series platforms, PS5/4, Steam, Epic, and GOG.
title: Bubsy 4D - Announcement Trailer | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Grindworm is a short horror game where you're buried alive in a collapsed underground mine, and your only hope for survival is an old mining machine. Grindworm is built around isolation, dread, and the slow erosion of reality. Check out the tense Grindworm announcement trailer. Grindworm will be available on PC.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Grindworm - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Get a peek at gameplay and the post-apocalyptic world of Cinder City (formerly Project LLL) in this trailer for the upcoming MMO tactical shooter game developed by BigFire Games, an NCSOFT studio. The Cinder City trailer shows brutal gameplay and some of the terrifying threats you'll face. Cinder City will be available on PC and consoles in 2026.

In Cinder City, you will suit up as a futuristic knight, navigate a world reshaped by future technology, and battle through iconic landmarks and high-tech battlegrounds in post-apocalyptic Seoul. Face brutal choices as you search for the lead character’s missing daughter -- solo or cooperatively with a squad.
title: Cinder City - Official Trailer | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Get an exclusive first look at the clip from the R-rated thriller that San Diego Comic-Con deemed too intense and shocking to show in full.

From the highly anticipated adaptation of master storyteller Stephen King’s first-written novel, and Francis Lawrence, the visionary director of The Hunger Games franchise films (Catching Fire, Mockingjay – Pts. 1 & 2, and The Ballad of Songbirds & Snakes), comes The Long Walk, an intense, chilling, and emotional thriller that challenges audiences to confront a haunting question: how far could you go? 

The cast includes Cooper Hoffman, David Jonsson, Garrett Wareing, Tut Nyuot, Charlie Plummer, Ben Wang, Roman Griffin Davis, Jordan Gonzalez, Joshua Odjick, Josh Hamilton, Judy Greer, and Mark Hamill.

The Long Walk is based on the novel by Stephen King and opens in US theaters on September 12, 2025.

#IGN
title: The Long Walk - Exclusive Red Band Clip (2025) Cooper Hoffman, David Jonsson

author: IGN
description:
Two heroes, one destiny. Watch the Tales of Xillia Remastered announcement trailer for this upcoming remaster of the RPG. Tales of Xillia Remastered will be available on Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X/S, and Steam on October 31, 2025.

#TalesOfXilliaRemastered #Gaming #IGN
title: Tales of Xillia Remastered - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Resource Rumble Game Mode Trailer for Marvel Rivals, the hit action team-based shooter developed by NetEase Games. Players will soon be able to access a brand-new game mode with Resource Rumble. Gather resources at specific capture points and weaken Knull's grip on his world. Fight through the Hel Gate, Breeding Caverns, and Throne of Knull to reign victorious. Resource Rumble is launching on August 21 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#MarvelRivals #Gaming #IGN
title: Marvel Rivals - Official Resource Rumble Game Mode Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Mayhem and John take down Apocalypse 9 in this gory scene from Season 2 of Peacock's Twisted Metal.

In the episode, which premieres on Peacock on August 21, John and Quiet forge an uneasy alliance with fellow contestants as they face their most dangerous challenge yet. With time running out and the odds stacked against them, they must put aside their differences and work together to survive.

#IGN
title: Twisted Metal: Episode 208 - Exclusive Clip (2025) Anthony Mackie, Saylor Bell Curda

author: IGN
description:
Gear up. Tether up. Throw down. Watch the Out of Time gameplay trailer for this upcoming multiplayer co-op roguelike game to see chaotic gameplay and the hordes of enemies you'll fight. Out of Time will be available on PC via Epic Games Store on September 25, 2025.

Whether you’re swinging a medieval sword, blasting cyberpunk plasma cannons, or riding prehistoric mounts into the sunset, Out of Time is here to break every rule — including the calendar.

The Shattering has fused all eras into one giant mess, and your mission – should you accept it – is to dive in, gear up from millions of possible load outs, and survive a gauntlet of dragons, killer robots, mutant crabs, and other things your therapist will hear about later.

#OutOfTime #Gaming #IGN
title: Out of Time - Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Gamescom Trailer for Project Motor Racing, an upcoming racing simulation game developed by Giants Software. Players will be able to race through over 10 classes of vehicles in Career, Online, and more modes. With unprecedented visual quality, players will race in classic vehicles from the 1970 Porsche 917K through the blockbuster days of Group C and GT1 to the last of the big-engine beasts of the early 2000s. Project Motor Racing is launching on November 25 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC.

#ProjectMotorRacing #Gaming #IGN
title: Project Motor Racing - Official Gamescom Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Halo ODST Legendary Warbond Trailer for Helldivers 2, the hit third-person action online shooter developed by Arrowhead Game Studios. Players can progress through the new Halo ODST-themed Legendary Warbond, packed with the M7S SMG, M6C/Socom handgun, and the MA5C Assault Rifle, to wage war as a member of the Obedient Democracy Support Troopers (ODSTs). Earn Halo ODST-inspired armor, patterns, and more with the Halo ODST Legendary Warbond for Helldivers 2, launching on August 26 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#Helldivers2 #HaloODST #Gaming
title: Helldivers 2 x Halo - Official ODST Legendary Warbond Trailer

author: IGN
description:
It’s time for a little magic in Grow a Garden! The brand-new Beanstalk Update has arrived, bringing Jack, the Giant, and even a Golden Goose to your island. 

In this video, we break down everything you need to know about the Beanstalk Event:
How to grow the Beanstalk and contribute crops
Climbing the obby for hidden rewards
Unlocking the portal to the top after 7 contributions
Meeting the Giant and shopping at Goliath’s Goods
Full details on crops, points, shop stock, and rewards

0:00 - Intro
0:43 - Beanstalk Event Overview
1:49 - Climbing the Beanstalk
2:17 - Meeting the Giant
2:58 - The Cycle Continues

For more on Grow a Garden, check out our growing Wiki guide at https://www.ign.com/wikis/grow-a-garden/
title: Grow a Garden - Beanstalk Update FULL Breakdown (Jack, Giant & Golden Goose!)

author: IGN
description: Check out the Gamescom Trailer for Permafrost, a survival action-adventure game developed by SpaceRocket Games. Players will set out into an everlasting winter to gather resources, hunt game, and survive in the harsh landscape. Endure the cold in Permafrost, coming soon to PC (Steam).
title: Permafrost - Official Trailer | gamescom 2025
